name: Powerboat VR
description:
Need a holiday? Always wanted to own or drive a powerboat? Now you can - in VR!

Soak up the sun, and the 80s vibe, as you explore a beautiful tropical island network!

Earn XP to unlock new boats via a variety of different activities such as discovering new wildlife, delivering cargo or taking part in races. Or, if you prefer a more relaxed gaming session, you can earn XP by simply sailing around and taking in the sights.

Key Points

1. Fully physics driven boat/buoyancy simulation.
2. Dynamic 3D ocean wave system.
3. Dynamic time of day.
4. Fully interactive VR controls.
5. Earn XP to unlock new boats via a variety of different play styles including races, cargo delivery, wildlife discover or even just driving your boat.
6. Take part in races and discover a variety of wild life species as you explore the tropical island chain.
7. Need some help? This game supports local, none VR, co-op so a friend can join in a help you earn extra XP!
8. Varied wildlife to discover and observe including fish shoals and, of course, sharks!
